full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 761 Filed 08/10/22 Page 159 of 246 2454 LCGVMAX5 Loftus - cross MS. STERNHEIM: Thank you, Professor Loftus. THE COURT: All right. Thank you, Ms. Sternheim. Ms. Pomerantz. MS. POMERANTZ: Thank you, your Honor. CROSS-EXAMINATION BY MS. POMERANTZ: Q. Good afternoon. A. Good afternoon. Q. I believe you testified that in addition to being a researcher, you often serve as a consultant, right? A. Yes. Q. And that entails consulting with lawyers about cases, right? A. Yes. Q. And sometimes it involves testifying at trials? A. Correct. Q. So let's first talk about consulting. You consult with attorneys in criminal cases, right? A. Yes. Q. And you've consulted with attorneys hundreds and hundreds of times, right? A. Yes. Q. You've consulted with defense attorneys in criminal cases hundreds of times, right? A. Probably, yes. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00016642
